## SessionResolutionSummary.attempts property

How many attempts have been made to resolve the session.

Attempts are made according to the frequency specified by \[RETRY\_UNKNOWN\_SESSION\_STATE\_DELAY\].

This count is only correct for the current run of the Holochain conductor. If the conductor is restarted then this counter is also reset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
attempts: number;
```
